name: Ultimate Car Driving
description:
What better way to explore a beautiful coastal city than from behind the wheel of a luxury sports car? Pick one of the impressive, highly detailed vehicles and show your driving skills in this demanding environment. The city is your greatest friend and the greatest enemy. It will amaze and astonish you with its views, while demanding your full attention with its narrow streets and crowded intersections.

Features :
- Realistic driving simulator
- Realistic physics
- High quality vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles
- Easy to play driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!
